lenders.name: Abay Ethiopian Cuisine
lenders.loan_because: In lieu of giving party favors to the guests at our wedding, we decided to loan modest amounts to entrepreneurs in 10 African countries on the guests' behalf.  All of our attendees were provided information for the entrepreneur in which they invested.  We've continued to loan to African entrepreneurs by waiving corkage fees we collect from customers and applying those funds towards our Kiva account.
lenders.occupational_info: Heather is an Environmental Engineer.  Jamie is an attorney who owns an Ethiopian restaurant.  As an entrepreneur, Jamie knows how beneficial it is to have the funds to start or expand a business.

lenders.name: Rui
lenders.loan_because:
Being an entrepreneur myself, i truly believe that investing in human talent is always a good investment. Due to a recent opportunity and the difficulties in my home country, I understand how fortunate I am and would like to use Kiva as a way of spreading hope. Everyone deserves an opportunity to have a decent life and achieve their potential and personal realization.

All my loans are dedicated to the memories of Luís António, Belmira Joaquina and Liduina Avelar da Silva. May peace be with them wherever they are.

"You must be the change you wish to see in the world" - Gandhi

"We ourselves feel that what we are doing is just a drop in the ocean. But the ocean would be less because of that missing drop." - Mother Teresa of Calcutta
lenders.occupational_info: I basically manage multiple IT projects in an UK travel industry big player.

I like that I can give this money and actually know who is benefitting and always prefer giving money towards under-delevoped countries.

lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great way to give someone a chance at a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell voice over IP products to people around the world. Teliax.com offers a cost effective way to communicate via the internet.

lenders.name: Lora
lenders.loan_because: In paying the household bills and extra expenses for the baby, I sometimes forget how truly blessed I am. I loan when I feel anxious about money because it reminds me of how much I have to give, and how I can help others achieve their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people heal themselves.

lenders.name: Florian
lenders.loan_because:
because i love to help and support other people, their ambitions and ideas.
it should be the mission of everyone more or less "privileged" to let other participate.
go for it! :)

lenders.name: Claudia
lenders.loan_because: Be the change you want to see in the world.

lenders.name: The Greenes
lenders.loan_because: I want my children to understand how lucky we are and that it is our responsibility to help other people achieve their dreams of a better life.

lenders.name: Max
lenders.loan_because: Years ago I started my business with a lot of imagination and a little bit of money.  I got a break from a friend of a friend in the form of a 1st client and money.  I loan because I want others to get a break too.
lenders.occupational_info: I help business find new customers via the internet and television.

lenders.name: Joy
lenders.loan_because: We believe strongly in giving a portion of all we make to charity.  Kiva.org is a wonderful charity to give to. We implicitly trust the Kiva leadership team and the entire organization. Its a pleasure for us and our shoppers to follow the progress of the entrepreneurs we are blessed to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I run the website http://www.spendyourhusbandsmoney.com. I do everything from build relationships with the makers of our goods to make the website beautiful.

lenders.name: Becca
lenders.occupation: still trying to figure it out
lenders.loan_because: It is important to me to make a contribution to eradicating poverty. I believe in Kiva's ability to foster a culture of philanthropy and show that the contribution of an individual can have a significant positive impact on someone they have never met.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been studying international economic development and microfinance for a long time now. I am currently looking for work in microfinance and opportunities to travel overseas to experience what is going on in the field.

lenders.name: Svetha
lenders.loan_because: It is a virtuous cycle.

lenders.name: lillian
lenders.loan_because: It's the least I can do.

lenders.name: doug
lenders.occupational_info: I run the Americas of a global Brokerage company.

lenders.name: Pauline
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering people to let them improve their lives. I think that loans, as opposed to charity, let people take pride in the fact that they are able to accomplish their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm currently studying as a religion student in Texas, with the goal of becoming a United Methodist minister - either a pastor or missionary. I believe that God loves all people, and we're here to help put that love into action - helping to feed the stomachs as well as the minds and souls of our neighbors around the world.

lenders.name: Chandra
lenders.loan_because: We all must continue the cycle of uplifting those around us. I also loan as I intend on fulfilling each and every one of the 10  Covenants (book written by Tavis Smiley)
lenders.occupational_info: My 9 - 5 job is an SAP Trainer. I train individuals on business processes and transactions within a software called SAP. My side gig is blogging and I'm also an Avon Ind. Sales Rep. because I'm a beauty junkie, and the extra money is a great help as a single parent.

lenders.name: Kris and Jim
lenders.loan_because:
It is the right thing to do.
I little here, goes a long way there.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I think it's nice to give a hand 'up' instead of a hand 'out'

lenders.name: Ulysse and Nora
lenders.loan_because: God has been very good to us, and we want to share with others less fortunate than ourselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in charge of safe drinking water for our municipality. It is a great responsibility and I take my job very seriously. I enjoy working.

lenders.name: Jennifer & Jorge
lenders.occupation: HR Rep / Latin America Business Manager
lenders.loan_because: We want to provide opportunites for those people willing to better themselves and have had little resources to do so.

lenders.name: Betsy
lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed to be a blessing to others. I want to empower women across the world with the means to make a life for themselves and their family.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I had a little extra $$ burning a hole in my pocket.
lenders.occupational_info:
When I'm at work, I usually read --  I edit and proofread textbooks for an educational publisher. 

When I'm not at work, I usually read -- mostly mysteries.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: Giving is the most powerful way of expressing gratitude for God's abundance.
lenders.occupational_info: I use  ephemera and otherwise unused paper and materials and recycle them into unique creations and usable items  such as journals and postcards.

lenders.name: Cassandra
lenders.loan_because: I want to help as many people as I can achieve and reach the vision and goals they have for freeing themselves and their families from poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently building a business as an affiliate marketer online.

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: Feels good to help people help themselves

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: I want to support people who dream to change the environment around them for the better and make themselves stronger.

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: I come from a small community, but one with a strong sense of community. I've really enjoyed reading the stories of small business men and women on this webpage and felt that this would be  a great way, as one person in a global community, to help generate opportunities for prosperity for others in my "global neighborhood".
lenders.occupational_info: I am a civil engineer working for a local government in Seattle, Washington, USA. The flood hazard reduction projects I work on all have the aim of improving the quality of life for our citizens by improving public safety and reducing the economic and social impacts of flooding in our community.

lenders.name: Devra
lenders.loan_because: I believe that individuals can make a difference globally and Kiva has provided an outstanding way for people to feel connected to the world.  I lend to small businesses globally because I appreciate that they are working to improve their lives and communities and in this small way, I can help them achieve their goals.

lenders.name: Scott Salisbury Homes
lenders.loan_because: To give to others less fortunate
lenders.occupational_info: We are contracted to build homes for our clients

lenders.name: Marie
lenders.loan_because: It's important to try to bless as  many people as you can.  It's what we are here to do--to help others. Everyday, do something for someone...no matter how small.
lenders.occupational_info: I help to create a vision on screen that tells a story about a person, place or thing. My ideal work is creating stories that really matter and can create change. Most of the time I help create stories for pure entertainment--stories that can  make one laugh or even cry.

lenders.name: For the Man I Love
lenders.loan_because: We want to support local entrepreneurs around the world
lenders.occupational_info: Promoting "handmade" over "mass produced" products

lenders.name: Philippe
lenders.loan_because: Sharing is joy!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a business student in Leeds (UK).

lenders.name: Shai
lenders.loan_because:
I strongly believe in individual interaction.
The personal IS political, in a literal sense; One positive personal interaction CAN be a political, or transformative act.

lenders.name: James & Trisha
lenders.loan_because: Why not?  Saving our bottles and cans to recycle - using the money to fund Kiva loans!

lenders.name: tom
lenders.loan_because: because everyone needs so cash from time to time
lenders.occupational_info: I bbq food in a smoker

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: People need finance and I don't think large institutional holders of capital should be the only source.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise money for charities in the UK

lenders.name: Kohan
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people become self sufficient & to live life by their own ethics.  I like seeing small businesses grow.
lenders.occupational_info: I write computer software that designers & photographers use to make their photos look even better.

lenders.name: Daniel Lövquist
lenders.loan_because: I love Kiva which gives me the opportunity to help others help themselves. Together we can support ambitious individuals with faith and small financing to seed a positive change to their life. Do as me and join Kiva and inspire individuals around the world with this great opportunity of sharing. If you are unsure or want help to get going I would be glad to assist you. Just contact me and I will help you get started. You can find my contact details on my website.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a father of two kids + two bonus teens + two SOS children in Zimbabwe. I am 34 years old from Sweden working with online business and with a ambition to make the world a better place.

lenders.name: Monica
lenders.loan_because: I like to feel I can make a difference for someone less fortunate than me

lenders.name: Sonia & Ken
lenders.loan_because: Helping others in need is a priority in our lives!

lenders.name: Cell Reverse Search
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work at with one of the largest data brokers in the world. My focus is in cell phone numbers.

The site is http://www.getcellphonenumber.com where you can search unpublished phone numbers and lookup cell phone numbers by name.

lenders.name: Dominik
lenders.loan_because: Conventional development aid is inefficient and mostly ineffective.

lenders.name: Vladislau
lenders.loan_because: I represent young small computer company. However, we already sell imported goods under our trademark (TrioniX). We have a lot of new ideas, but there are some difficulties with investment in our country.
lenders.occupational_info: Company have a small office in Minsk, two young perspective managers. Our company have few partners and a lot relationships and trusted potential partner-producers in China and a big potential for sales in our country. We need to buy a new batch of  consumer electronics. So I ask you for investments.

lenders.name: Yolanda
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it is as i have struggled as a single mother myself. I understand how it is to want to work towards your dreams and then to have them stripped away from you. I will do the best I can by way of small donations and getting others involved as well.
lenders.occupational_info: Give complimentary Middle and High School Motivational Lectures. Lecture topics include Job Interviewing, Personal Grooming, Confidence Development, Communication Skills, and many more.

lenders.name: Marianne
lenders.whereabouts: Newcastle upon Tyne Tyne and Wear

lenders.name: lieke
lenders.loan_because: I get inspired by all these people who wants to invest in their own future and of those around them.

lenders.name: Redorum
lenders.occupation: Web Hosting, Backup, IT Consulting Services
lenders.loan_because: Being a small business, we know how hard it is to raise money to expand or start up a business that will be successful.  We loan because we want to be a part of the process in facilitating and helping others reach their goals and dreams.   Above all else,  to help Kiva with their mission.
lenders.occupational_info: We are an Information Technology  group where we consult, negotiate and manage companies' IT department while providing great services in web and email hosting, design, web programming, VoIP, remote desktop support, backup (http://www.archcloud.com) and many other services for entrepreneurs and small businesses.  We are also part of the San Diego Microfinance Alliance (http://www.kiva.org/community/viewTeam?team_id=5873).

lenders.name: Adele, Leo & Nadine
lenders.loan_because: It's teh right thing to do!
lenders.occupational_info: Building business.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: It is just a small amount of money for me, but it can change a lot if I lent it someone who really needs it.
lenders.occupational_info: I´m studying social sciences & psychology and I´m working in two parttime jobs to earn some money...

lenders.name: Trond
lenders.loan_because: I hope to be a contributer to make business oportunities for someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: Dealing with HR and People matters in a large global company.

lenders.name: Knut
lenders.loan_because: It's an easy way to help others bulit a better life, and it makes me more aware of how other people live.

lenders.name: Ina Mar
lenders.loan_because: I believe that making one small difference after another can change the world and give our children a better place to live. The Kiva Entrepreneurs are hard-working people who just need a little hand of help to improve their businesses and their lives. People who have the will to work and study and just need an opportunity. I believe that giving this kind of opportunity to become financially independant is much more efficient than food aid.

lenders.name: Leilana
lenders.loan_because: of the chance to help someone else.

lenders.name: TinyLittleBabyBird
lenders.loan_because:
"When power becomes gracious and descends into the visible - such descent I call beauty. And there is nobody from whom I want beauty as much as from you who are powerful: let your kindness be your final self-conquest."
Thus Spoke Zarathustra (1885). Part II, Chapter 13, "Those Who Are Sublime"  --  Friedrich Nietzsche

lenders.name: Fredrik
lenders.loan_because:
Supporting individuals in their effort towards a better life is essential to bridge the gap between rich and poor. 
This is for the benefit of mankind.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: It brings me great joy. I'm so happy there is a system for me to do this.
lenders.occupational_info: I research and promote the use of biochar for improving soil while producing energy from biomass

lenders.name: Genevieve
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people and what they can achieve.
lenders.occupational_info: I design 'green' and efficient types of technologies for use in many different industries (computer, wind turbine, consumer products, etc.).

lenders.name: Advanced Support
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we believe in empowering people to help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: We help nonprofit organizations by providing comprehensive fundraising and accounting solutions so they can concentrate on fulfilling their missions.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: assist in the process
lenders.occupational_info: I draw in 3D what ever needs to be built.

lenders.name: Lidia
lenders.loan_because: The idea of helping less fortunate get a financial break to improve their own and the lives of others around them appeals to me. I wholeheartedly buy into the micro-lending concept, as I cannot see a better return on my investment than a reduction in global poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I help corporate customers around the World to get the best out of their investment in the Microsoft Windows operating systems.

lenders.name: Marcial Wills
lenders.loan_because: It is a beautiful thing to help someone who needs help... if we all did the same the world would be way different
lenders.occupational_info: Data Storage Systems technical support.

lenders.name: Ed
lenders.loan_because: A hand up is not a hand out.
lenders.occupational_info: Quality Assurance (solving problems before they happen, while they happen, and after the happen) to build quality.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I've been to places where I've seen how much there is yet to do and how easy it can be to pitch in. I love meeting people and hearing about different places. It's an exciting way to be involved with people I would not otherwise know.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: having owned my own soup bar, I know the pressure and hard work as well as the joy of working independently ... now I want to support other women in doing the same and succeeding with their own business

lenders.name: Inge Moen
lenders.loan_because: We truly belive this is the best way to help the developing world. By lending them a small amount, they will be able to grow their own business, and build their own economy. This for the benefit of mankind.

lenders.name: Bob Uva
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower people to build self-sustaining businesses that will raise their families out of poverty.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I like to encourage economic development and sustainable growth in developing nations.

lenders.name: Aaron and Julie
lenders.loan_because: I received a gift on Christmas for 100 dollars to loan. I have found I micro-loans interesting and enjoyable.
lenders.occupational_info:
Work to create and maintain internet content.
Currently for a small publisher.

lenders.name: Andreas
lenders.loan_because: even a small support can be the starting point for a better life
lenders.occupational_info: A banker currently working in an "emerged" Emerging Market

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.loan_because: Because we are all responsible for each other,and your success is my success....
lenders.occupational_info: asset protection

lenders.name: Lindsey & Tony
lenders.loan_because: "Whoever sows sparingly will also reap sparingly, and whoever sows generously will also reap generously." II Cor. 9:6

lenders.name: Gina B.
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to loan funds to help someone raise themselves up rather than donating, which only helps for the short-term.  I enjoy using my repaid loans to help others again and again.

lenders.name: kristina
lenders.occupational_info: telling about people's skills, dreams and needs.

lenders.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org Perpetual Fund
lenders.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) engages in poverty alleviating projects. Our major project is to provide microloans through the Kiva platform. You can help support P2P by joining our lending team here: http://www.kiva.org/team/poverty2prosperity
lenders.occupational_info: This P2P Fund is our general "Perpetual Fund". All funds deposited into this account are locked for permanent funding of loans on Kiva and may never be withdrawn. This 'general' fund targets just about all sectors of loans. P2P manages a number of funds including those targeted towards loans for women entrepreneurs, education & tuition fees, youth, and even personal housing. Please see our site for more details.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a big bank.

lenders.name: Ralf
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do, and we're able to do it.

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.loan_because: I have a little extra money, and people need capital to grow their economy.
lenders.occupational_info: I help engineers design Internet routing and security equipment.
